Name: MEG-BIDS OMEGA RestingState_sample
HowToAcknowledge:
- You are free to use all data in OMEGA for research purposes; please aknowledge its authors and cite the following reference in your publications if you have used data from OMEGA: 

- Niso G., Rogers C., Moreau J.T., Chen L.Y., Madjar C., Das S., Bock E., Tadel F., Evans A.C., Jolicoeur P.,  Baillet S. (2016). OMEGA: The Open MEG Archive. NeuroImage 124, 1182-1187. doi:  https://doi.org/10.1016/j.neuroimage.2015.04.028. 
OMEGA is available at: https://omega.bic.mni.mcgill.ca 

- And please include the following message: *'This data was obtained from the OpenNeuro database. Its accession number is ds000247'*
